approval_data.project_summary:
1.  **Project Overview**: A modern e-commerce platform to sell various products online.
2.  **Functional Requirements**:
    -   User registration and login.
    -   Product catalog with search and fi...

requirements.title: User Registration
requirements.description: The platform shall allow users to register with a valid email address and a strong password. The system shall validate the email format and password strength (e.g., minimum length, special characters).

requirements.title: User Login
requirements.description: The platform shall allow registered users to log in using their registered email and password. The system shall provide feedback for incorrect credentials and implement account lockout after multiple failed login attempts.

requirements.title: Product Catalog Display
requirements.description: The platform shall display a product catalog with product images, titles, descriptions, and prices. The catalog shall be paginated to handle a large number of products.

requirements.title: Product Search
requirements.description: The platform shall provide a search functionality allowing users to search for products by keywords (e.g., product name, description). The search results shall be relevant and displayed quickly.

requirements.title: Product Filtering
requirements.description: The platform shall allow users to filter products based on various criteria (e.g., price range, category, brand).

requirements.title: Shopping Cart Functionality
requirements.description: The platform shall allow users to add products to a shopping cart, view the cart contents, modify quantities, and remove items from the cart.

requirements.title: Secure Checkout Process
requirements.description: The platform shall provide a secure checkout process that includes address information, shipping options, payment information, and order confirmation.  All sensitive data must be encrypted.

requirements.title: Platform Performance
requirements.description: The platform shall be fast and responsive. Page load times should be minimized.

requirements.title: Data Security
requirements.description: The platform shall be secure to protect user data, including personal information and payment details.  Implement security best practices.

requirements.title: User registration and login
requirements.description: User registration and login

requirements.title: Product catalog with search and filtering
requirements.description: Product catalog with search and filtering

requirements.title: Shopping cart functionality
requirements.description: Shopping cart functionality

requirements.title: Secure checkout process
requirements.description: Secure checkout process

requirements.title: The platform must be fast and responsive.
requirements.description: The platform must be fast and responsive.

requirements.title: The platform must be secure to protect user data.
requirements.description: The platform must be secure to protect user data.
